translation.Message_0_Page_0: Thank you for your service, <name_char>. We're happy that you have worked with us to achieve a unified Ireland, even if it isn't that way yet.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: Since you are a <color=rare>Officer</color> now, we believe you're up to the task. Report to <color=rare>Officer Callahan</color> for your assignment.
